name: remotion-render-lambda
description: Lambda function to process SQS messages and trigger Remotion renders

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip . -x "*.map" && cd .. && zip -r function.zip node_modules -x "*.md" "*.txt" "test/*" "tests/*" "*.ts" "node_modules/@remotion/*/*.md" "node_modules/@remotion/*/test/*"
